Automated Tower Equipment Inspection

For Accurate Billing and Inventory Control

Use standard ground-level photos to detect and measure your tower equipment in minutes. Telescope provides instant visibility into your installed inventory—for accurate billing and wind load assessment without ever launching a drone.

Get Started Watch Demo

TowerCo Challenges

Common problems that Telescope solves for tower companies

Missing Equipment Records

Tenants install new equipment without always notifying you. Missing equipment records lead to lost revenue and compliance risk.

Slow, Costly Inspections

Drone inspections are slow, costly, and logistically complex. Traditional methods require specialized equipment, pilots, and weather coordination.

Outdated Records

Outdated records prevent tower optimization. You may think that you have space on the tower but in reality you don't, and vice-versa.

How Telescope Works

From photo to inventory—in minutes

1

Capture

Take ground-level photos with a smartphone. No drones, pilots, or special equipment required.

📱 [Image placeholder: Smartphone capturing tower photo from ground level]
2

Detect

Our AI identifies and measures over 200 tower components with 2-inch accuracy—even if partially visible.

3

Reconcile

Instantly sync results with your ERP system or export detailed reports for billing and compliance.

📏
2-inch measurement accuracy
Precise detection even on tall installations

Fast, efficient inspections

Works with Tarantula and other systems

Intelligent detection
Works even with partial visibility

Telescope vs Drone-Based Inspections

See why leading TowerCos are switching to Telescope

Feature Telescope Drone
Setup Time ✓ Minutes ✗ Hours
Required Gear ✓ Smartphone or DSLR ✗ Drone, controller
Image Processing ✓ Lightweight CV (2D) ✗ 3D mesh, manual QA
Accuracy ✓ 2 inches ✗ Varies
Output Format ✓ ERP-ready report ✗ Raw media or 3D model
On-Site Safety ✓ No climb, no flight ✗ Flight prep + air clearance
